name: Boppin'

task.description: Setting sound. Take SoundBlaster, Eight voices, 16 bits and SoundBlaster.
task.name: dosexec

content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Select the game's archive file
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_boppin.conf
  main_file: boppin.exe
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: archive
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_boppin.conf
    key: joysticktype
    section: autoexec
    value: none
- task:
    description: Setting sound. Take SoundBlaster, Eight voices, 16 bits and SoundBlaster.
    executable: setup.exe
    name: dosexec
